Class InflowConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.rampart.handler.config.InflowConfiguration
Deprecated. 

public class InflowConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

This is the representation of the inflow configurations of the security module.

setBSPCompliant

public void setBSPCompliant(boolean value)
Deprecated. 
This will set whether request or response evaluation should adhere to "Basic Security Profile"

Parameters:
value - true if evaluation should adhere to "Basic Security Profile" else false. Default is true.

getBSPCompliant

public java.lang.String getBSPCompliant()
Deprecated. 
Gets whether security processing is configured to handle BSP compliant manner. "true" or "false"

Returns:
Returns "true" or "false".
